attributes.action: stop the Armed Forces' non compliance with Attachment of Earnings Requests made by the CSA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The RAF has the highest non-compliance, according to the CSA,  They not only refuse to comply but they refuse to reply to any communication from the CSA (with regard to my case).  It could be that my ex-husband is a commissioned Officer and also Aircrew, but this should make no difference.  They are well paid, on a regular basis and are unlikely to be made redundant.  They, as a collective, are the most able to pay and therefore, should be 'encouraged' by the Armed Forces to do so.
